name: Cheesecake in a Jar
author: RuthE
summary: Perfect for summer picnics, this is a no-bake version of cheesecake in a portable jar with fresh strawberries.
ingredients: 6  pecan shortbread cookies (such as Keebler® Sandies), finely crushed
directions: Stir together cookie crumbs, butter, and 2 tablespoons sugar in a bowl until blended
Divide mixture evenly among jars (about 3 1/2 tablespoons each) and gently press (do not pack) into bottoms
Halve 6 strawberries for garnish, and set aside
Beat together cream cheese, lemon juice, and 1/2 cup sugar in bowl with an electric mixer at medium speed until smooth
Fold in whipped cream and chopped berries, and divide evenly among jars (about 1/2 cup each)
Top each with a 2 berry halves and cover with lids
Chill at least 2 hours and up to 3 days
